messages.message: Let's try to understand the nature of slowness first. @dlluncor where were we seeing slowness? Was it specifically limited to Flow operations? Or, entire Instabase performance was slower?

We originally only implemented it for deleting in the UI, not delete through operations like Flow. Move takes a long time in S3 land since it's a move recursively of all keys. Perhaps someone could try to speed up copy and move for starters @Ashish

Ok. I am trying to gather all the info before we take any concrete steps. We (infra) don't want to digress from our Q2 goals and some of the solutions suggested here require significant amount of work.
